meanings.sent1: I photoduplicated the important papers for my boss.
meanings.sent2: She photoduplicated the contract for all the team members.
meanings.sent3: The photoduplicated report made everyone laugh because it had a silly picture on it.
meanings.sent4: His smile photoduplicated across the room, spreading joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the photoduplicating machine echoed through the office, signaling productivity.

meanings.sent1: I made a photoduplicated of the presentation for each attendee.
meanings.sent2: The photoduplicated looked just like the original document.
meanings.sent3: The photoduplicated was so clear that it seemed like the real thing.
meanings.sent4: Her photoduplicated of the map helped us navigate the city easily.
meanings.sent5: The photoduplicated had a slight smudge, but it was still readable.
